IP_SYN_3_style_6: The patient was brought to the operating room for stent management. General anesthesia was induced. Diagnostic bronchoscopy showed granulation tissue in the left mainstem limb of the Y-stent. A rigid tracheoscope was inserted and the stent was removed intact using rigid forceps. Following removal flexible bronchoscopy with cryotherapy was performed to ablate the granulation tissue in the left mainstem. The procedure was uncomplicated.
